channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jeff Bezos tells Gen Z entrepreneurs to gain work experience before launching new companies: ‘I started Amazon when I was 30’
item.description: The Amazon founder reminds Gen Z that Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates are the exception.

item.title: The ‘Highguard’ Mystery: Two Weeks To Launch And Complete Silence
item.description: Highguard continues to be the weirdest game mystery going on right now with an imminent launch and complete dev silence.

item.description: Physical AI is moving from screens to factories. Business leaders need to prepare now before robots reshape the relationship between capital and labor...

item.title: Exactly What To Automate With AI In 2026 For Faster Business Growth
item.description: Stop doing tasks manually that should run on autopilot. Here’s what to automate in 2026 for faster business growth. What’s your excuse?

item.title: Trump to interview BlackRock's Rick Rieder for Fed chair role
item.description: President Donald Trump will interview BlackRock's Rick Rieder on Thursday for the role of Federal Reserve chairman, sources tell FOX Business.

item.title: Hwy Haul Launches AI Platform To Boost Profits, Cut Costs For Freight Brokers

item.title: Productivity gains fuel U.S. growth while hiring slows
item.description: EY Chief Economist Gregory Daco says businesses are generating growth with fewer workers and rising efficiency.

item.title: How luxury homebuilding giant Toll Brothers took the drama out of CEO succession
item.description: The Fortune 500 company offers a masterclass in CEO hand-offs.

item.title: Why Pharmacies Like Walgreens, Rite Aid And Independents Are Dying
item.description: “Can you — should you — keep expanding at this pace?” “Yes, we can… and yes, we should…. We would be crazy not to.”

item.title: Molson Coors CEO: We’re doing our part to solve society’s ‘occasion problem’ – and we’re getting some unexpected help
item.description: Actor Christopher Walken is on board for our new Miller Lite campaign because these days, we could all use more “Legendary Moments.”

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
